instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2159: What is A2159? A2159 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3301, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01598..
definitions.820-01598: What is 820-01598? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: question about dfu restore
threads.message:
i want to know if possible dfu restore by configurator without battery and housing. for exampleif  can I  do restore if i have only connected motherboard by usb to another mac and also plugged on charger?.thanks

i forced to be in dfu mode by changing <CHIP>U4770</CHIP>. so dont need keyboard for dfu

i am getting error 0xFAE (4014) Unexpected device state  DFU expected "recovery"( probably forced into DFU mode externally)

this error is with everything connected and also when i am trying to restore only motherboard connected

p.s problem was that ssd  circuits was shorted and i changed 4 pcs nands. tsb 4227 and tsb 4228 . programmed by jc P13. no more short. i am getting ssd voltages. 1.8v  0.9v 2.5v but can't restore. i also changed <CHIP>U9080</CHIP>

all awake and slps2r voltages are there..

threads.title: question about dfu restore
threads.message:
You should turn off the board and force it into DFU manually.
Don't start restore from recovery state.

You should use corresponding DFU pads...

threads.title: question about dfu restore
threads.message: maybe you don't understand what i asked.sorry for my bad english. please read once again what i wrote. thanks 2 informaticos for your effort. you are great man

threads.title: question about dfu restore
threads.message: for example if you will change nand on ipad/iphone it will stuck in dfu mode and for restore battery/power supply must be connected and dock/port of course. no need anything else for restore. i dont know it about macbook. macbook also need battery connected or charger is enough for dfu restore .and also it need anything else to be connected or not?thanks

threads.title: question about dfu restore
threads.message:
finally i fixed this macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>   <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01598</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>. so reason of this problem was damaged one of the replaced nands. changed all of them second time and problem fixed.  and about my question i checked only motherboard connected with charger and its restored. so its possible to restore without anything else.its comfortable for testing purpose during repair.

thanks
